page.title: 15Houses (2)
page.content: Some buildings used to be made of sandstone.Most of the{modern houses are built on the end of the older rows to make mini-estates.The rest of the modern houses are scattered over Edgmond. On Friday afternoon{,19th May,1665 a{terrible fire}broke out in a blacksmiths shop in Newport{.Richard {Shelton}owned the shop.It existed between Barclays Bank and Tuckers.It used to be called "The Antelope".The fire was so big that you could see the smoke as far away as Woodseaves ,Shifnal ,Oakengates and Wellington.People at Lilleshall stopped their work to watch the disaster. As a result of this few houses from before this period remain.
